review_blob: Refreshing, lactic aroma with raspberry, acid but Light body, Sweet aftertaste and no bitterness.
beer_name: Berliner Kindl Weisse Mit Schu Schwarze Johannisbeere

review_blob: Great aromatic ale with dense body, but still refreshing. Well balanced in all aspects.
Great complex beer, but with an aftertaste with too much Sweetness. Needed a little bit more of bitterness to balance the taste.
Bitterness from coffee notes and sweetness from from cocoa work toguether to give an impressive body to the beer.
Signature aroma and bitter taste. Beer full of personality in its balance of taste and freshness.
Good cost-benefit beer in Brazil. More aromatic and tasty than regular mainstream beers.
Light and refreshing, with really discrete hints of malt well balanced with acid fruits. Almost no aftertaste. The pepper doesnt even appear under the malt taste.
